# Quick Integration Summary

## What You Get vs What You Need to Provide

### ðŸŽ¨ What's AUTO-GENERATED (No Setup Needed)
Every industry gets a fully functional UI with:
- âœ… Complete HTML/CSS layout
- âœ… Responsive design
- âœ… Form interfaces (contact, booking, signup, etc.)
- âœ… Placeholder buttons for third-party services
- âœ… Industry-specific sections and features

### ðŸ”Œ What YOU Need to Provide (For Live Integrations)

| Industry | Main Integrations | What to Get | Where to Get It |
|----------|------------------|-------------|-----------------|
| **Restaurant** | Uber Eats link<br>DoorDash link | Your store URLs | Your merchant dashboards |
| **Non-Profit** | Stripe for donations | API keys (pk_live, sk_live) | https://stripe.com |
| **Dental** | Calendly scheduling | Booking URL | https://calendly.com |
| **E-commerce** | Stripe checkout | API keys + Product IDs | https://stripe.com |
| **Salon/Spa** | Square Appointments | App ID, Access Token | https://squareup.com |
| **Fitness** | Mindbody | Site ID, API Key | https://mindbodyonline.com |
| **Real Estate** | Google Maps | Maps API Key | https://console.cloud.google.com |
| **Education** | Teachable/Thinkific | Subdomain or site name | https://teachable.com |
| **Healthcare** | Doxy.me (telemedicine) | Room URL | https://doxy.me |
| **General** | Mailchimp (newsletter) | API Key, List ID | https://mailchimp.com |

---

## ðŸš€ Simple 3-Step Process

### Step 1: Generate Your Redesign
1. Paste your website URL
2. Select your industry
3. Choose colors and style
4. Click "Generate Redesign"

**Result:** You get a complete, working website with placeholder integrations

### Step 2: Identify Which Integrations You Want
Look at the generated site and decide which features you want to activate:
- Payment processing?
- Online booking?
- Food delivery links?
- Newsletter signup?

### Step 3: Connect Your Services
For each integration you want:
1. Sign up for the service (most have free tiers)
2. Get your API key or URL from their dashboard
3. Replace placeholder links/forms with your real credentials

---

## ðŸ’° Cost Breakdown

| Service Type | Free Option | Paid Option | Notes |
|--------------|-------------|-------------|-------|
| **Payments** | Stripe (free account) | 2.9% + $0.30 per transaction | Industry standard |
| **Scheduling** | Calendly (free tier) | $10-$15/mo for features | Easiest to set up |
| **Email Marketing** | Mailchimp (free up to 500 contacts) | $13+/mo | Most popular |
| **Maps** | Google Maps ($200/mo free credit) | Pay as you go after credit | Usually stays free |
| **Telemedicine** | Doxy.me (free basic) | $35+/mo for features | HIPAA compliant |

**Most common setup:** Stripe + Calendly + Mailchimp = **$0-25/mo**

---

## âš¡ No Integration Required

These features work WITHOUT any third-party setup:
- âœ… Contact forms (collect data to email or database)
- âœ… Photo galleries
- âœ… Service descriptions
- âœ… About pages
- âœ… Testimonials
- âœ… Basic calculators (mortgage, BMI, etc.)
- âœ… FAQs
- âœ… Staff/team profiles

---

## ðŸŽ¯ Common Use Cases

### "I just want a better-looking website"
**What you need:** Nothing! Generate with "General" industry
**Integrations:** None required

### "I want to accept online orders (Restaurant)"
**What you need:** 
- Option 1: Just add your Uber Eats/DoorDash URLs (free, 5 minutes)
- Option 2: Stripe for direct payments ($0 setup, 2.9% per transaction)

### "I want to take appointments (Dental/Salon/Healthcare)"
**What you need:** Calendly account (free tier available)
**Time:** 10 minutes to set up

### "I want to sell products (E-commerce)"
**What you need:** Stripe account + product listings
**Time:** 30 minutes to set up

### "I want to accept donations (Non-Profit)"
**What you need:** Stripe or PayPal account
**Time:** 15 minutes to set up

---

## ðŸ“‹ Pre-Setup Checklist

Before requesting integrations, have these ready:

### For Payment Processing (Stripe)
- [ ] Business name and address
- [ ] Bank account for deposits
- [ ] Tax ID (EIN for US businesses)
- [ ] Product/service descriptions and prices

### For Online Booking (Calendly/Square)
- [ ] Service duration times
- [ ] Staff availability schedule
- [ ] Booking buffer times
- [ ] Cancellation policy

### For Food Delivery (Uber Eats/DoorDash)
- [ ] Restaurant must be active on platform
- [ ] Your public store URL from platform
- [ ] Menu uploaded to platform

### For Maps (Google Maps)
- [ ] Google Cloud account (free)
- [ ] Business address to display
- [ ] Credit card for verification (won't be charged with free tier)

---

## ðŸ†˜ Troubleshooting

**Q: The generated site has placeholder text like "YOUR_API_KEY_HERE"**
A: Normal! Those are intentional placeholders. Replace them with your actual credentials.

**Q: Do I need all the integrations listed for my industry?**
A: No! Pick and choose. The site works fine with just the UI - add integrations as needed.

**Q: Can I mix features from different industries?**
A: Yes! Use "Additional Changes" field to request specific features from other industries.

**Q: I don't have a business account for X service yet**
A: Most services offer instant sign-up. Start with free tiers and upgrade as needed.

**Q: The integration isn't working**
A: Double-check:
1. API keys are correct (no extra spaces)
2. Keys are for LIVE mode (not test mode)
3. Service is active in your third-party dashboard
4. Billing is set up if required

---

## ðŸŽ“ Learning Resources

### Video Tutorials
- **Stripe Setup:** https://stripe.com/docs/development/quickstart
- **Calendly Setup:** https://help.calendly.com/hc/en-us
- **Google Maps API:** https://developers.google.com/maps/gmp-get-started

### Documentation
- All services have step-by-step guides in their help centers
- Search "[Service Name] API documentation" for detailed guides

---

## âœ¨ Pro Tips

1. **Start Simple:** Get the redesign first, add integrations later
2. **Test Mode:** Most services have test/sandbox modes - use them first!
3. **Free Tiers:** Start with free tiers, upgrade only when needed
4. **Security:** Never share API keys publicly or commit them to Git
5. **Backup:** Save your API keys somewhere safe (password manager)

---

**Ready to integrate?** Choose your industry, generate your redesign, then follow the specific integration steps in INDUSTRY_FEATURES.md for detailed setup instructions.
